Flow.description: - Registration Number change from user to pharmacy -Updated Messaging for Pharmacy Assistants -New wording for OAT -Removed License year from the top of the welcome screen -Readding pharmacy operations section -Pass renewal year into invoice email subject -Wording updates - Feedback Update -Application Complete Checkbox enabled -Allow creation within flow of accounts -Pharmacy Assitant enhancement -Add payment successful check -Remove phar managers ability to edit their own information in welcome screen -Send Owner PDF apex action - Remove unused params -Send Owner PDF apex action - add missing required parameter -Split up the address in Welcome screen - PharOwner and PharOwnerRep table -Pharmacy_Address__c as Col in Welcome screen -Phar Ques Screen: Replace duplicate question with New methadone patients accepted -Removed Phar Owner col from welcome screen -Added text prompt at the start of the employment information screen -Pass list of fee line item Id's inside invoice apex action -Make Employment Information Editable -Update Merge Feilds -Updated Get so that it does not query cases that are deleted -Updated alternate pharmacy manager to collection choice set -Add New Custom Template for Pharmacy Owner Form -Add New Custom Template for Email Invoice -Employment Information Updates (Comms Feedback) -Adding Fee Creation -Defualting Email and adding wording -Table formatting errors -Apex calss updated to take list of Names -Owner PDF Included -Added Lookups -Start Date Not Mandatory -Wording and spacing updates -Late Fee Boolean Variable Available for Input -New Collection For Fee Line Item With Reduced Fields For PDF -added caution msg screen before evry screen that dont have previous button -updated PharmacyQuestions screen removed header and updated one more header -deleted fields from pharmacy operation section from pharmacy questions fields

fields.name: RenewalConfirmationMessage
fields.fieldText: This is confirmation that you have completed the renewal process.

fields.name: NotPaidConfirmationMessage
fields.fieldText:
The pharmacy licence is not renewed until the payment and the pharmacy licence renewal application, signed by the pharmacy owner or owner's representative, are received by the NSCP. An invoice and pharmacy licence renewal application have been forwarded to you by email.


Both the payment and the signed renewal application must be received no later than November 30th to avoid a late fee.

fields.name: PaidOnlineMessage
fields.fieldText:
The pharmacy licence is not renewed until the pharmacy licence renewal application, signed by the pharmacy owner or owner's representative, is received by the NSCP. The application has been forwarded to you by email.


The signed renewal application must be received no later than November 30th to avoid a late fee.

﻿

You can access your receipt on the payment record found here and click the "download receipt" button.

fields.name: InstructionForEmployeeInformation
fields.fieldText: Review the list of employees below, if you identify staff that is no longer employed in the pharmacy please assign an end date. To add staff members who are not listed below please use the "Add Employees" toggle on the bottom left of this screen

fields.name: Pharmacy_Assistant_Not_Found
fields.fieldText: Pharmacy Assistant Not Found

fields.name: EmployeeMessageScreen
fields.fieldText: Add A Pharmacist, Pharmacy Technician, Pharmacy Technician Candidate, Intern, or Student

fields.name: Employee
fields.fieldText: Employee

fields.name: Role
fields.fieldText: Role

fields.name: Start_Date
fields.fieldText: Start Date

fields.name: PharmacyAssistantMessageScreen
fields.fieldText: Add Pharmacy Assistant Information only.( If you do not find a Pharmacy Assistant please check off the Pharmacy Assistant not found checkbox and Click on Next to add)

fields.name: Pharmacy_Assistant
fields.fieldText: Pharmacy Assistant

fields.name: Start_Date_Assistant
fields.fieldText: Start Date

fields.fieldText: {!FeeTotalAmountWithoutHST}

fields.name: TotalAmountWithHST
fields.fieldText: {!FeeTotalAmountWithHST}

fields.name: When_Would_You_Like_To_Pay
fields.fieldText: How Would You Like To Pay

value.stringValue: Where Would You Like To Send The Invoice?

fields.name: InputAllDeclarationsMessage
fields.fieldText: You must select "yes" for all declarations in order to proceed

fields.name: Norenwablepharmaciesmessage
fields.fieldText:
There Are No Eligible Pharmacies To Renew For. To see your outstanding applications please review the "Applications" tab at the top of the screen in the navigation bar. A reminder of the requirements are as follows:


  1. Send in the signed owner PDF form
  2. Complete payment

fields.name: Disclaimeremailforowner
fields.fieldText: A signed copy of the pharmacy renewal application will be emailed to the address specified below:

fields.name: MakeSureYouClickNextMessage
fields.fieldText:
Do Not Close The Page!

Please ensure you click the "Next" button once the green check mark appears.

Failure to do so may result in renewals being processed inaccurately.

fields.name: PaymentUnsuccessfulMessage
fields.fieldText: Sorry your payment was not successful please try again

fields.name: PharmacyAssistantInformationDisclaimer
fields.fieldText:
Please enter the information of the pharmacy assistants who were not found on the previous screen.


When the information has been added, click Next to return to the previous page and click Add to select this pharmacy assistant from the updated list

fields.name: First_Name
fields.fieldText: First Name

fields.name: Last_Name
fields.fieldText: Last Name

fields.name: RenewalApplicationHeader
fields.fieldText: RENEWAL APPLICATION

fields.name: LicenseYearDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Pharmacy Renewal Instructions

Note: The Pharmacy renewal application is NOT complete until the NSCP is in receipt of a

COMPLETE application for renewal which includes completion of the online form, receipt of the signed form from the pharmacy owner, and payment of the fee.

fields.name: ReviewRenewalInformationBelow
fields.fieldText: REVIEW PHARMACY INFORMATION

fields.name: OwnerInformationHeader
fields.fieldText: OWNER

fields.name: OwnerRepInformationHeader
fields.fieldText: OWNER REPRESENTATIVE

fields.name: ManagerWordingSubHeader
fields.fieldText: If the pharmacy’s trade name or owner on record (as indicated above) are not accurate, please contact the NSCP promptly to have it changed.

fields.name: PharmaccyManagerHeader
fields.fieldText: CURRENT PHARMACY MANAGER

fields.name: UpdateEmailMessage
fields.fieldText: To update your email, please contact NSCP office at registrations@nspharmacists.ca.

fields.name: AlternatePharmacyManagerHeader
fields.fieldText: ALTERNATE PHARMACY MANAGER

fields.name: AlternateManagerNotFoundMessage
fields.fieldText: Please type the name of the pharmacist that the owner * designates to act in the absence or disability of the pharmacy manager. If the individual does not appear in the list, please notify NSCP office as soon as possible.

fields.name: Alternate_Manager_Name
fields.fieldText: Alternate Manager Name

fields.name: SignedFormMessage
fields.fieldText:
The NSCP will provide you with a form which the designated pharmacist must sign confirming their consent to this designation, and this signed form must be submitted to the NSCP.

* In order for this pharmacist to act in the capacity of a pharmacy manager, this pharmacist must be installed as an interim pharmacy manager in compliance with the Pharmacy Act and Regulations, including section 30 of the Registration, Licensing and Professional Accountability Regulations. Please contact the NSCP for further information.

fields.name: PharmacyOperationHeader
fields.fieldText: PHARMACY OPERATIONS

fields.name: Please_indicate_if_your_pharmacy_offers_any_of_the_following_services
fields.fieldText: Please indicate if your pharmacy offers any of the following services

fields.name: Does_the_pharmacy_use_the_services_of_another_pharmacy_to_prepare_process_or_pac
fields.fieldText: Does the pharmacy use the services of another pharmacy to prepare, process or package medications?

fields.name: MethadoneHeader
fields.fieldText: DRUG THERAPY FOR THE TREATMENT OF OPIOID USE DISORDER

fields.name: methadonedisclaimer
fields.fieldText: Does the pharmacy provide drug therapy for opioid use disorder?

fields.name: Pharmacy_Provides_Methadone_Services
fields.fieldText: Pharmacy Provides OAT Services?

fields.name: NewMethadonedisclaimer
fields.fieldText: Is your pharmacy accepting new OAT patients?

fields.name: Is_your_pharmacy_accepting_new_methadone_patients
fields.fieldText: New OAT Patients Accepted

fields.name: OpenAllYeardisclaimer
fields.fieldText: Is your pharmacy open 7 days a week, 365 days per year?

fields.name: Pharmacy_open_all_year
fields.fieldText: Pharmacy Open All Year

fields.name: NotrOpenAllYearDisclaimer
fields.fieldText:
If “no”, please indicate which days the pharmacy is closed:

Note: Pharmacies open only five or six days a week will have to make special arrangements for patients who are not permitted to take methadone home with them (see the Methadone Maintenance Treatment Services and Standards of Practice document for further details)

fields.name: Days_Pharmacy_Closed_Text
fields.fieldText: Days Pharmacy Closed

value.stringValue: Name:245, BillingStreet:245, BillingCity:245, BillingState:245, BillingCountry:245, BillingPostalCode:245

textTemplates.name: EmailBodyTextTemplate
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!AccountSelectionTable.outputSelectedRow.Name}


{!Get_Current_User_Contact_Record.Name} has sent you a payment request.


Please click on the link below to make a secure online payment:


{!Get_Payment_Request.ChargentOrders__Payment_Link_Formatted__c}


Thanks,

Nova Scotia College Of Pharmacist
